column4: i don't mean to interrupt, but why is it that I can login to gdm with my login/pass, but a TTY says my login is invalid?
i'll ask again, it's pretty busy tonight... why can i login to gdm but a text login says my user/pass is invalid
i'll ask again, it's pretty busy tonight... why can i login to gdm but a text login says my user/pass is invalid
(sorry, i would just like to get this solved) :\
good question. No idea, sorry.. Tried googling, I assume?
i tried, not finding much yet..thought i'd ask here before hours of research  :x
do you have odd character sets or encoding enabled?
i don't think so. just en-US standard
i don't think so. just en-US standard (repeat to add your nick)
what happens when you ctrl-alt-f4 or whatever after logging in to gmd
/after/ logging in? just takes me to TTY4 login
right, does that login work then? or is that the problem?
that's the problem  :(   (well, i can't login after logging into gdm or even without gdm.. no text login at all)
ok, just making sure it was consistent
I know there are options to disable logins with anything but GDM. that may have happened accidentally
hmm...god only knows where i could find such settings  :\
i love ubuntu to death and will stay with it to the grave, but *@$*, it's a mess.
it's only slightly less a mess than the rest :)
